    HIV.E.DE2Already on ART at first antenatal care visitART initiation timing for pregnant or postpartum women - Already on ART at first antenatal care visit
    HIV.E.DE3Newly on ART during pregnancyART initiation timing for pregnant or postpartum women - Newly on ART during pregnancy
    HIV.E.DE4Newly on ART during labour and deliveryART initiation timing for pregnant or postpartum women - Newly on ART during labour and delivery
